vulnerabilities.title: Information Disclosure in requests
vulnerabilities.description: Requests before 2.31.0 leaks Proxy-Authorization headers to destination servers during HTTPS redirects.

vulnerabilities.title: Cookie Leakage in urllib3
vulnerabilities.description: urllib3 before 2.0.6 may leak Cookie header content during cross-origin redirects.

vulnerabilities.title: ReDoS in urllib3
vulnerabilities.description: urllib3 before 1.26.5 is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service.

vulnerabilities.title: Arbitrary Code Execution in PyYAML
vulnerabilities.description: PyYAML before 5.4 allows arbitrary code execution via yaml.load() with untrusted input.

vulnerabilities.title: Denial of Service in Pillow
vulnerabilities.description: Pillow before 10.0.1 is vulnerable to DoS via a crafted image with extreme dimensions.

vulnerabilities.title: Code Injection in Pillow
vulnerabilities.description: Pillow before 9.0.0 allows code injection via PIL.ImageMath.eval.

vulnerabilities.title: NULL Pointer Dereference in cryptography
vulnerabilities.description: cryptography before 41.0.4 has a NULL pointer dereference when loading PKCS#7 certificates.

vulnerabilities.title: Denial of Service in Django
vulnerabilities.description: Django before 4.2.7 is vulnerable to DoS via a large number of characters in username during auth.

vulnerabilities.title: Cookie Exposure in Flask
vulnerabilities.description: Flask before 2.3.2 may expose session cookie in response body under certain conditions.

vulnerabilities.title: XSS in Jinja2
vulnerabilities.description: Jinja2 before 3.1.3 is vulnerable to XSS via xmlattr filter with crafted input.

vulnerabilities.title: Denial of Service in Werkzeug
vulnerabilities.description: Werkzeug before 3.0.1 is vulnerable to resource consumption via multipart form data.

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection in SQLAlchemy
vulnerabilities.description: SQLAlchemy before 2.0.0b1 has potential SQL injection in limit/offset clauses.

vulnerabilities.title: Terrapin Attack in Paramiko
vulnerabilities.description: Paramiko before 3.4.0 is vulnerable to the Terrapin SSH prefix truncation attack.

vulnerabilities.title: CRLF Injection in aiohttp
vulnerabilities.description: aiohttp before 3.9.0 is vulnerable to CRLF injection via HTTP request smuggling.

vulnerabilities.title: Untrusted Root Certificate in certifi
vulnerabilities.description: certifi before 2023.7.22 includes the e-Tugra root certificate which was compromised.
